name: Circle Visualizer
description: A simple, but elegant way to see your music.

name: Beat Defence
description: My first game with an original idea. Defend Earth from music tempo missiles. Creative Ideation: Jack Barnell

name: Amazing Clock #1
description: Just messing around with the time values that you can find in the p5 library.

name: The Game of Life
description: I coded the Game of Life Cellular Automaton in p5.js (This was before I knew Coding Train did so as well).

name: Website Logo
description: How does this look so good???

name: Perlin Noise Music Visualizer
description: When Daniel Shiffman from the Coding Train made the perlin noise terrain generator, I followed along. This already looked cool, but I later added a music twist to it!

name: Pig Latin Translator
description: This one is pretty self explanatory... If you want to confuse your friends, use this thing, I guess.

name: Snake Game
description: Ever since I wrote my first line of code, I have wanted to make a game. So I present my first proper game: Snake. This is all my code, not Daniel Shiffman's, by the way. (But Snake was not my original idea).
